exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "(fix ex_diff_n (f : R -> R -> R) (n : nat) (x y : R) {struct n} : Prop := continuity_2d_pt f x y /\\ match n with | 0%nat => True | S n0 => ex_derive (fun z : R_AbsRing => f z y) x /\\ ex_derive (fun z : R_AbsRing => f x z) y /\\ ex_diff_n (fun u v : R => Derive (fun z : R => f z v) u) n0 x y /\\ ex_diff_n (fun u v : R => Derive (fun z : R => f u z) v) n0 x y end) f n x y" on hypothesis of type "(p + k < n)%nat".

original: intros n p k H f x y H0. unfold ex_diff_n in H0. destruct H0 as [H0 _]. apply H0 in H. apply derivable_pt_lim_derive in H. unfold continuity_2d_pt. intros eps. apply H in eps. auto.
